title: DynamicAO
description: Graduate Thesis: Compute real-time per-fragment ambient occlusion in dynamic meshes

title: Cloth Simulation
description: Simulate a cloth and sphere collisions using Implicit Euler and spare matrices.

title: Raytracing
description: Generate CPU raytraced scenes. Support for Implicit Ellipses and Meshes

title: NeRF
description: Implementation of the Neural Radiance Field research paper to synthesize novel views

description: Compute N-link inverse kinematics using Gradient Descent, Newton's Method, and BFGS

title: Poisson Blending
description: Take a source image and apply a section to a target image seamlessly by matching gradients

description: Research project to simulate a vision-based approach for an autonomous vehicle using Segmentation and Pure Pursuit PID controller

title: Differential Drive Mobile Robot
description: Simulate a DDMR to navigate an arbitrary map using Probalistic Roadmap (PRM)

title: Mechanical Integrator
description: Automatically compute integrals of an arbitrary function using mechanical principles

title: Identifying Concentration States
description: Undergrad Thesis: Use Gradient Boosting algorithm to determine concentration states from EEG data
